---
title: "/bank"

<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

See your minions bank.

**Usage**

- `/bank [page:<integer>] [item:<string>] [items:<string>] [format:<string>] [search:<string>] [filter:<string>] [sort:<string>] [flag:<string>] [flag_extra:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | `integer` | No | The page in your bank you want to see. | - |
| `item` | `string` | No | The item you want to pick. | - |
| `items` | `string` | No | Type a bank string to lookup | - |
| `format` | `string` | No | The format to return your bank in. | json, text_paged, text_full |
| `search` | `string` | No | Text to search your bank with. | - |
| `filter` | `string` | No | The filter you want to use. | - |
| `sort` | `string` | No | The method to sort your bank by. | value, alch, name, quantity, market |
| `flag` | `string` | No | A particular flag to apply to your bank. | show_price, show_market_price, show_alch, show_id, show_names, show_weights, show_all, wide |
| `flag_extra` | `string` | No | An additional flag to apply to your bank. | show_price, show_market_price, show_alch, show_id, show_names, show_weights, show_all, wide |
